Class NearestNeighborHeuristic

java.lang.Object
NearestNeighborHeuristic.NearestNeighborHeuristic
public class NearestNeighborHeuristic extends Object
Nearest Neighbor Heuristic to solve CVRPs.

    • getNextVertex

      private int getNextVertex​(int currentVertex)
      Gets the next vertex. Selects the shortest distance between the current vertex to another vertex.
      Parameters:
      currentVertex - The current vertex.
      Returns:
      The next vertex to visit.

    • updateFeasibleVertices

      private void updateFeasibleVertices()
      Update the feasible vertices for the next selection. A vertex is feasible if the additional demand does not exceed the capacity otherwise it will be removed.

    • computeTourLength

      private void computeTourLength()
      Computes the length of the tour.
